author: Doug Bostrom
content: Two more dead pods and there’s one “problem” solved. Just pretend the ship is going in a very small circle, within its own length so to speak.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content:
At least when you don’t get the tech quite right on a ship it ain’t going to fall out of the sky like a Boeing.
But not a place i’d like to be as I prefer to be in charge of my own itinerary.
